languages.description: Une courte bannière de Lunaro suspendue.

languages.description: Uno striscione sospeso corto di Lunaro.
languages.name: Striscione Sospeso Zariman (Lunaro, Corto)

languages.name: Estandarte colgante de Lunaro Zariman (corto)

languages.name: Zariman ルナーロ ハングバナー（短）

languages.description: Um estandarte Lunaro curto e suspenso.
languages.name: Estandarte Lunaro da Zariman (Curto - Suspenso)

languages.description: ธงแขวน Lunaro ที่มีขนาดสั้น
